metadata.synopsis: The portrait kid freaks out at the sight of the vandalised Vlaakith portrait.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to 1330; -2; -794 and interact with the portrait. Choose to vandalise it.When the dialog ends, the kid will walk over and play the AD.

0.speaker: Youth Vis'kiir
0.text: Oh, tsk'va, what did you do? What did you do?!
0.context: InternalNodeContext: tsk-VA (means "shit")NodeContext: Panicked at the player-vandalized portrait (slightly angry as they saw the player do it)

1.speaker: Youth Vis'kiir
1.text: What is this? Tsk'va! I need to get rid of it before the Inquisitor sees!
1.context: InternalNodeContext: tsk-VA (means "shit")NodeContext: Panicked at the player-vandalized portrait
